statements: SELECT researcher_name, patient_name, healthcare_provider_name FROM HealthcareEquityResearchData
SELECT * FROM HealthcareEquityResearchData WHERE bias_type = 'racial bias'
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, patient_name FROM HealthcareEquityResearchData ORDER BY researcher_id DESC
SELECT healthcare_provider_name, patient_care_outcome FROM HealthcareEquityResearchData WHERE patient_care_outcome = 'positive'
SELECT DISTINCT healthcare_provider_id, healthcare_provider_name FROM HealthcareEquityResearchData
SELECT * FROM HealthcareEquityResearchData;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, healthcare_provider_name, patient_care_outcome FROM HealthcareEquityResearchData WHERE bias_type = 'racial bias';
SELECT researcher_name, healthcare_provider_name, patient_name FROM HealthcareEquityResearchData WHERE healthcare_provider_id = 1001 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, healthcare_provider_id, healthcare_provider_name, patient_id, patient_name FROM HealthcareEquityResearchData WHERE bias_description LIKE '%discrimination%';

SELECT researcher_name, healthcare_provider_name, patient_name FROM HealthcareEquityResearchData WHERE bias_type = 'gender bias' AND patient_care_outcome = 'positive' ORDER BY researcher_id ASC, patient_name;
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Providers;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE provider_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM Healthcare_Providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patient_Care_Outcomes WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, patient_condition FROM Patient_Care_Outcomes WHERE patient_condition LIKE '%Diabetes%';
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE provider_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, provider_specialty FROM Healthcare_Providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE provider_specialty = 'Pediatrics' AND provider_name LIKE 'Dr%';
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, provider_specialty FROM Healthcare_Providers ORDER BY provider_id DESC;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, provider_specialty FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE provider_specialty = 'Neurology' ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE bias_score > 0.5;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, bias_score FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY specialty ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patient_records JOIN care_outcomes ON patient_records.patient_id = care_outcomes.patient_id WHERE outcome = 'Improved';

SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers JOIN patient_records ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = patient_records.provider_id JOIN care_outcomes ON patient_records.patient_id = care_outcomes.patient_id WHERE healthcare_providers.provider_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY healthcare_providers.provider_name DESC, patient_records.age ASC, care_outcomes.outcome_date DESC

SELECT provider_name, specialty, average(age) as avg_age FROM healthcare_providers JOIN patient_records ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = patient_records.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name, specialty HAVING avg_age > 50 ORDER BY avg_age DESC

SELECT patient_name, gender, outcome FROM patient_records JOIN care_outcomes ON patient_records.patient_id = care_outcomes.patient_id WHERE gender = 'Male' AND outcome = 'Recovered' ORDER BY patient_name ASC, care_outcomes.outcome_date ASC
SELECT provider_name, specialty, bias_score FROM healthcare_providers WHERE bias_score > 0.7 ORDER BY bias_score DESC, provider_name ASC
SELECT DISTINCT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty IS NOT NULL ORDER BY provider_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_id, institution FROM Researchers WHERE research_area='Health Sciences';
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM Healthcare_Providers ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patient_Care_Outcomes WHERE care_rating > 3 ORDER BY care_rating ASC, provider_id;
SELECT provider_id, bias_type, impact_on_outcomes FROM Provider_Bias WHERE bias_type='Racial Bias';
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_id, research_area FROM Researchers WHERE institution = 'University XYZ';
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Patient_Care_Outcomes ORDER BY care_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Provider_Bias WHERE bias_type = 'Racial Bias';
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE institution='Hospital A';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, condition FROM patient_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT provider_id, researcher_id, bias_score FROM bias_data WHERE impact_score > 0.8;
SELECT outcome FROM outcomes_data WHERE provider_id=3;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE institution = 'Hospital A';
SELECT patient_name, age, condition, healthcare_providers.name FROM patient_data INNER JOIN healthcare_providers ON patient_data.provider_id = healthcare_providers.provider_id;
SELECT researcher_id, name, specialty, institution FROM researchers WHERE specialty = 'Oncology' ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT patient_name, age, condition, healthcare_providers.name AS provider_name, outcomes_data.outcome FROM patient_data INNER JOIN healthcare_providers ON patient_data.provider_id = healthcare_providers.provider_id INNER JOIN outcomes_data ON patient_data.provider_id = outcomes_data.provider_id AND patient_data.patient_id = outcomes_data.patient_id WHERE patient_data.age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
